html.main:
Bitcoin timeseries

Javascript code:

gexamples.bitcoin1 = {

    xaxis: {
        type: 'time'
    },

    data: function (chart) {
        var src = 'http://www.quandl.com/api/v1/datasets/BAVERAGE/USD.json?auth_token=-kdL9rjDHgBsx1VcDkrC&rows=' + 365;
        d3.json(src, function (raw) {
            d3.giotto.crossfilter({
                raw: raw,
                data: raw.data,
                labels: raw.column_names,
                callback: function (cf) {
                    chart.setData(cf);
                }
            });
        });
    }
};
